fields.label: Instructions
fields.message:
Certain fields can have their visibility set to one of the following values:

Visible: the value will be visible to players
Partially visible: the players will see ??? instead of the value
Hidden: the field will be hidden from the players

If the user is an admin and is logged in, they will see all fields as though they were set to visible

fields.label: Stats
fields.name: stats
fields.instructions:
Visible: the value will be visible to players
Partially visible: the players will see ??? instead of the value
Hidden: the field will be hidden from the players

sub_fields.label: Manual Value
sub_fields.name: manual_value
sub_fields.instructions: Set the skill manually (will ignore any values set for base ability score or proficiencies)

fields.label: Character Electrum Pieces
fields.name: character_electrum_pieces
fields.instructions: 1 electrum piece = 5 silver pieces = 50 copper pieces

fields.label: Character Gold Pieces
fields.name: character_gold_pieces
fields.instructions: 1 gold piece = 2 electrum pieces = 10 silver pieces = 100 coper pieces

fields.label: Character Platinum Pieces
fields.name: character_platinum_pieces
fields.instructions: 1 platinum piece = 10 gold pieces = 20 electrum pieces = 100 silver pieces = 1000 copper pieces
